movie.title: The Robber
movie.plot: A champion marathoner leads a double life as a serial bank robber, sprinting between fixes (and away from police cavalcades) as many as three times a day.

events.title: Johann Kastenberger robs his first bank after being released from prison
Johann Kastenberger robs three banks in a single day
